LanguageData.DHTC.Prey.Label: Children can be hunted
LanguageData.DHTC.Prey.Tooltip: Children can be hunted by any wild predator. This doesnt change manhunter
LanguageData.DHTC.CanTakeDamage.Label: Children can be hurt
LanguageData.DHTC.CanTakeDamage.Tooltip: Children won't be directly targeted, but they can still be hurt by indirect sources
LanguageData.DHTC.canBeRaidTarget.Label: Children can be targeted by raiders
LanguageData.DHTC.canBeRaidTarget.Tooltip: Children can be target by any raid or similar threat
LanguageData.DHTC.canEquipWeapons.Label: Children can be capable of violence
LanguageData.DHTC.canEquipWeapons.Tooltip: When holding a weapon they will not be protected regardless. Disable this if you never want a child to take part in combat
LanguageData.DHTC.ChildCantEquip: Children can not equip a weapon
LanguageData.DHTC.betterFleeDestination.Label: Improved child flee
LanguageData.DHTC.betterFleeDestination.Tooltip: Children will run try to flee to their parents, their room, or any friendly colonist in that order based on if those locations are safe, and not in combat.
LanguageData.DHTC.tradersCanSellChildren.Label: Children can be sold by traders
LanguageData.DHTC.tradersCanSellChildren.Tooltip: With this disabled, stock generators will not be able to generate children
LanguageData.DHTC.manInBlack.Label: Man in Black Changes
LanguageData.DHTC.manInBlack.Tooltip: With this enabled, man in black will appear if only children are still alive.
LanguageData.DHTC.noKidBetray.Label: Refugee kids won't betray
LanguageData.DHTC.noKidBetray.Tooltip: With this enabled, refugee kids will have no chance to attack your colony.
